thread.title: Adam Rodriguez Is Headed to "Jane the Virgin"
thread.title_full: Adam Rodriguez Is Headed to "Jane the Virgin"

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: Adam Rodriguez Is Headed to "Jane the Virgin"
text:
Share Tweet Pin E-mail Getty Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Adam Rodriguez has officially arrived: Not only has the Magic Mike star landed a recurring role on Empire , but The Hollywood Reporter has confirmed that he'll be making an appearance on season two of Jane the Virgin as well.
Adam will be playing a "very critical" writing professor who "doesn't believe in coddling students," according to THR .
"In the writers room, we broke this arc with Adam in mind and we are all so thrilled to have him," Jane the Virgin writer Jennie Snyder Urman told the Hollywood Reporter in a statement. "Wahooo!" â€‹
Season two has already racked up a pretty impressive list of guest stars: In addition to Adam, Britney Spears and Kesha are also set to make appearances on the show this fall.
Follow Alanna on Twitter .
